subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Matt Puempel and Kyle Turris scored second-period goals, and the backup goalie Andrew Hammond made 34 saves as the Ottawa Senators beat the host Islanders, 2-1.
snippet: Matt Puempel and Kyle Turris scored second-period goals, and the backup goalie Andrew Hammond made 34 saves as the Ottawa Senators beat the host Islanders, 2-1.
